title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official 
Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal 
Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2025. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 224 of 2021), the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of NonAnimal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 638 of 2021), 
the Regulations of 2022, the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 50 of 2023), the European Union (Official Controls 
in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 51 of 2024), the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of NonAnimal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 549 of 2024), 
the Regulations of 2025, and these Regulations may be cited together as the 
European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of 
Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2025.

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Official Controls in relation 
to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020); 

“Regulations of 2022” means the European Union (Official Controls in relation 
to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) 
(No. 3) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 328 of 2022); and 

“Regulations of 2025” means the European Union (Official Controls in relation 
to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2025 (S.I. No. 38 of 2025). 

1 OJ L, 2025/1441, 23.7.2025 as affected by Corrigendum of 11 August 2025 (OJ L, 

2025/90643, 11.8.2025). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2025) 
of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting for the definition of— 

(a) 

“Annex I to EU Regulation 2019/1793” the following: 

[409] 3 

“‘Annex I to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex I to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(5) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2025/1441 of 18 July 20251;”, 

(b) 

“Annex II to EU Regulation 2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex II to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex II to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(5) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2025/1441 of 18 July 20251;”, 

(c) 

“Annex IV to EU Regulation 2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex IV to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex IV to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(6) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2025/1441 of 18 July 20251;”, 
and 

(d) 

“EU Regulation 2019/1793” the following: 

“‘EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 of 22 October 20192 as amended by 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 
20203, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/608 of 
14 April 20214, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2021/1900 of 27 October 20215, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2022/913 of 30 May 20226, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 20237, 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/286 of 16 
January 20248, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2024/3153 of 18 December 20249 and Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2025/1441 of 18 July 20251;”.

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 4. Regulation 8 (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2022)
text_raw:
4. Regulation 8 (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2022) 

of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

by substituting for clause 8(1)(m)(iii) the following: 

“in the case of a consignment of food of non-animal origin listed 
in such Annex, and in which the bag or packaging combines 
several small packages, it is sufficient that the identification code 

2 OJ No. L 277, 29.10.2019, p. 89. 
3 OJ No. L 144, 7.5.2020, p. 13. 
4 OJ No. L 129, 15.4.2021, p. 119. 
5 OJ No. L 387, 3.11.2021, p. 78. 
6 OJ No. L 158, 13.6.2022, p. 1. 
7 OJ No. L 25, 27.1.2023, p. 36. 
8 OJ L, 2024/286, 17.1.2024. 
9 OJ L, 2024/3153, 19.12.2024, as affected by Corrigendum of 21 January 2025 (OJ L, 

2025/90048, 21.1.2025). 

 
 
 4 [409] 

of the consignment is mentioned on the bag or packaging 
combining these small packages.”, and 

(b) by substituting for subparagraph 8(1)(o) the following: 

“for food of non-animal origin listed in such Annexes due to 
possible contamination risk by mycotoxins, including aflatoxins, 
the sampling and the analyses shall be performed in accordance 
with Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/2782 of 
14 December 202310.”.

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations are amended by deleting Regulation 24
text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by deleting Regulation 24 

(inserted by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2025).

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 6. The European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation)
text_raw:
6. The European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) 
(Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 
2024 (S.I. No. 310 of 2024) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 August, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

10 OJ L, 2023/2782, 15.12.2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 5

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give further effect to Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2025/1441 of 18 July 2025 (as affected by Corrigendum of 11 August 
2025) amending Implementing Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 on the temporary 
increase of official controls and emergency measures governing the entry into 
the Union of certain goods from certain third countries implementing 
Regulations (EU) 2017/625 and (EC) No. 178/2002 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020) in the manner specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 6 [409] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
